page.title: 05School Morning
page.content: The school is pretty small. It's got two classrooms with two teachers and 30 children and it's called Hinton St George First School. First we come in for registration. That means the teacher calls our names out to see if all the children are there. During the morning we do reading and language and sometimes maths until playtime. My friend called Anthony and I are the monitors for milk. We get the milk ready for the other children to drink at playtime. After having our milk we go out to play in the playground. Usually after play we go back to class and do maths till lunchtime. Then we put all our work neatly in front of us and get lined up ready to go into the dining room for dinner.
